thread.title: Good location and nice size room.
thread.title_full: Good location and nice size room. - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chris C
title: Good location and nice size room.
text: 1 min off Times Square this hotel is perfect for a couple of day visit to the big apple. Staff seem nice enough and the room was big enough for the 2 of us. When staying in New York your hardly in the room any way so I think this hotel was perfect. Didn't use restaurant or bag so can't comment on them but they look very nice.
